thread.title: MoSys to Showcase 100G LineSpeed PHY and Bandwidth Engine Intelligent Memory Products for High Density 100G to Terabit Networking Equipment at ECOC 2015
thread.title_full: MoSys to Showcase 100G LineSpeed PHY and Bandwidth Engine Intelligent Memory Products for High Density 100G to Terabit Networking Equipment at ECOC 2015

author: admin
title: MoSys to Showcase 100G LineSpeed PHY and Bandwidth Engine Intelligent Memory Products for High Density 100G to Terabit Networking Equipment at ECOC 2015
text:
Submitted by admin on 9/27/2015 @ 11:00 PM   MoSys, Inc. 
SANTA CLARA, Calif. -- (BUSINESS WIRE) -- MoSys (NASDAQ: MOSY): Who: MoSys (NASDAQ: MOSY), a leader in semiconductor solutions that enable fast, intelligent data access for network and communications systems, is exhibiting at stand #725. Product, Technology and Show Highlights: Product demonstrations of MoSys' latest LineSpeed™ gearbox and retimer PHY products featuring the industry's lowest power 100G retimer (CDR) and new 100G technology including Multi-Link Gearbox (MLG) and RS-FEC. New LineSpeed 100G Octal Retimer with support for IEEE 802.3bj Clause 91 RS-FEC and 100G Multi-Link Gearbox with OIF MLG- 1.0 and 2.0 to support aggregation of independent 10GE and 40GE links into a single 100GE (4x25G) link. 100G RS-FEC interoperability demonstration featuring MoSys' new LineSpeed 100G Octal Retimer with RS-FEC and Ixia's 100G Xcellon™-Multis QSFP28 Test Platform. MSH110 Low Power 100G Octal CDR features improved signal integrity, advanced test capabilities, and industry low power for QSFP28, CFP4, or CFP2 modules. LineSpeed extended reach 100G Gearbox and Retimer PHY IC family for line card applications. MoSys' Bandwidth Engine 2 Compact Development Kit solution with seamless connectivity and extensive FPGA platform support, including: Altera® Stratix® IV, Stratix V, Arria® 10 and upcoming Stratix 10 development kits available from Altera, HiTech Global and ReflexCES; and Xilinx® Virtex®-6, Virtex-7, Kintex® UltraScale™, Virtex UltraScale and upcoming UltraScale+ on development kits available from Xilinx and HiTech Global. 
Bandwidth Engine® ICs with an integrated serial interface, 0.5Gbits of high-access memory and macro acceleration functions are used for high rate packet processing applications including lookup tables, statistics, metering and buffering. What: The ECOC Exhibition is Europe's largest and most established annual show within the fibre optic communication technology industry and this year, will once again showcase the latest products and services as well as providing an unrivalled opportunity to meet and network with key suppliers and industry leaders. ECOC 2015 takes place September 27-October 1; Expo is September 28-30.
